Welcome to my personal website.

I am a PhD candidate at the Anton Pannekoek Astronomical Institute, University of Amsterdam and Dept of Earth and Life Sciences, VU University Amsterdam.
I'm an astronomer and an experimental exo-geophysicist.

View my Resume

About Me

I am originally from India. I did my bachelor's degree in Electronics Engineering from IIT Kharagpur, India and my master's degree in Astrophysics fron KU Leuven, Belgium.

Current Work

I am currently working in a high pressure laboratory at VU University with Wim van Westrenen to study the interiors of rocky extra-solar planets.
